H0.text: In which year was Mrs Indira Gandhi assassinated. 1975

H1.text: In which year was Mrs Indira Gandhi assassinated. 1980

H2.text: In which year was Mrs Indira Gandhi assassinated. 1981

H3.text: In which year was Mrs Indira Gandhi assassinated. 1984

A4.text: On 31 October 1984, two of Gandhi's Sikh bodyguards, Satwant Singh and Beant Singh, shot her with their service weapons in the garden of the prime minister's residence at 1 Safdarjung Road, New Delhi, allegedly in revenge for Operation Blue Star.
